member.name: T:Vogen.BsonSerializerAttribute`1
member.summary: Represent a marker for BSON generation.
member.typeparam: The type of the value object.

member.name: F:Vogen.ComparisonGeneration.Default
member.summary: Use the default, which is . This entry generally isn't used but is present to signify a default value which has not been specified in the attributes.

member.name: F:Vogen.ComparisonGeneration.Omit
member.summary: Omits the IComparable interface and implementation. Useful for opaque types such as tokens or IDs where comparison doesn't make sense.

member.name: F:Vogen.ComparisonGeneration.UseUnderlying
member.summary: Uses the default IComparable from the underlying type.

member.name: T:Vogen.Conversions
member.summary: Converters used to convert/serialize/deserialize Value Objects

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.None
member.summary: Don't create any converters for the value object

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.Default
member.summary: Use the default converters for the value object. This will be the value provided in the , which falls back to and

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.TypeConverter
member.summary: Creates a for converting from the value object to and from a string

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.NewtonsoftJson
member.summary: Creates a Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConverter for serializing the value object to its primitive value

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.SystemTextJson
member.summary: Creates a System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonConverter for serializing the value object to its primitive value

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.EfCoreValueConverter
member.summary: Creates an EF Core Value Converter for extracting the primitive value

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.DapperTypeHandler
member.summary: Creates a Dapper TypeHandler for converting to and from the type

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.LinqToDbValueConverter
member.summary: Creates a LinqToDb ValueConverter for converting to and from the type

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.ServiceStackDotText
member.summary: Sets the SerializeFn and DeSerializeFn members in JsConfig in a static constructor.

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.Bson
member.summary: Creates a BSON serializer for each value object.

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.Orleans
member.summary: Creates and registers a codec and copier for Microsoft Orleans. This feature requires .NET 8 and C#12 and cannot be polly-filled.

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.XmlSerializable
member.summary: Generates implementation of IXmlSerializable.

member.name: F:Vogen.Conversions.MessagePack
member.summary: Generates implementation of IMessagePackFormatter.

member.name: T:Vogen.Customizations
member.summary: Customization flags. For simple binary choices. More complex configuration options are specified as parameters in the .

member.name: F:Vogen.Customizations.None
member.summary: No customizations.

member.name: F:Vogen.Customizations.TreatNumberAsStringInSystemTextJson
member.summary: When serializing and deserializing an underlying primitive that would normally be read or written as a number in System.Text.Json, instead, treat the underlying primitive as a culture invariant string. This gets around the issue of JavaScript losing precision on very large numbers. See for more information. The preferred method, on .NET 5 or higher, is to use `JsonNumberHandling` in `JsonSerializerOptions`.

member.name: F:Vogen.Customizations.AddFactoryMethodForGuids
member.summary: For GUIDs, add a `FromNewGuid()` factory method, which is just `public static MyVo FromNewGuid() => From(Guid.NewGuid());`

member.name: F:Vogen.Customizations.GenerateLinqPadToDump
member.summary: Generate ToDump for LinqPad

member.name: T:Vogen.DebuggerAttributeGeneration
member.summary: Controls what debugger attributes are generated. Useful if you want to debug in Rider as that doesn't yet show all of the debugger attributes that Visual Studio can.

member.name: F:Vogen.DebuggerAttributeGeneration.Default
member.summary: Decided at compile team based on whether or not the has this flag set.

member.name: F:Vogen.DebuggerAttributeGeneration.Basic
member.summary: Just create the basic debug attributes - Rider friendly as Rider doesn't show some of the debugger attributes that Visual Studio shows.

member.name: F:Vogen.DebuggerAttributeGeneration.Full
member.summary: Creates the full debug attributes, including debugger type proxies. These attributes don't work well in the Rider debugger, so if you use Rider and want to debug, then use which will just generate ToString.

member.name: F:Vogen.DeserializationStrictness.AllowAnything
member.summary: Allows anything to be deserialized into your Value Object.

member.name: F:Vogen.DeserializationStrictness.AllowKnownInstances
member.summary: If your Value Object has 'Instances', then those are considered valid during deserialization.

member.name: F:Vogen.DeserializationStrictness.RunMyValidationMethod
member.summary: If your Value Object has a Validate method, it will be called to validate the incoming value during deserialization.

member.name: F:Vogen.DeserializationStrictness.DisallowNulls
member.summary: System.Text.Json only for now. By default, System.Text.Json allows nulls for reference types. If you want to disallow this behaviour for value objects, then set this flag.

member.name: F:Vogen.DeserializationStrictness.AllowValidAndKnownInstances
member.summary: If your Value Object has 'Instances', then those are considered valid during deserialization. If the incoming value doesn't match any known instance, and if your Value Object has a Validate method, it will be called to validate the incoming value during deserialization.

member.name: T:Vogen.MessagePackAttribute`1
member.summary: Represent a marker for MessagePack generation.
member.typeparam: The type of the value object.

member.name: T:Vogen.OpenApiSchemaCustomizations
member.summary: Controls schema customization.

member.name: F:Vogen.OpenApiSchemaCustomizations.Omit
member.summary: No customization.

member.name: F:Vogen.OpenApiSchemaCustomizations.GenerateSwashbuckleSchemaFilter
member.summary: Generate a schema filter. If Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen is not referenced, nothing will be generated.

member.name: F:Vogen.OpenApiSchemaCustomizations.GenerateSwashbuckleMappingExtensionMethod
member.summary: Generate extension method to map types with SwaggerGenOptions. If Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen is not referenced, nothing will be generated.

member.name: F:Vogen.OpenApiSchemaCustomizations.GenerateOpenApiMappingExtensionMethod
member.summary: Generate extension method to map types with Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi.OpenApiOptions. If Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi is not referenced, nothing will be generated.

member.name: T:Vogen.PrimitiveEqualityGeneration
member.summary: Defines if equality operators to the underlying primitives are generated.

member.name: F:Vogen.PrimitiveEqualityGeneration.Omit
member.summary: Do not generate.

member.name: F:Vogen.PrimitiveEqualityGeneration.GenerateOperators
member.summary: Generate equals operators for primitives.

member.name: F:Vogen.PrimitiveEqualityGeneration.GenerateMethods
member.summary: Generate equals methods for primitives.

member.name: F:Vogen.PrimitiveEqualityGeneration.GenerateOperatorsAndMethods
member.summary: Generate both operators and methods.

member.name: T:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration
member.summary: Defines if static abstract interfaces should be generated.

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.Omit
member.summary: Do not generate the interface definition, nor make the value objects derive implement the interface.

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.ExplicitCastFromPrimitive
member.summary: Generate the explicit casting operators from primitives.

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.ExplicitCastToPrimitive
member.summary: Generate the explicit casting operators to primitives.

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.ImplicitCastFromPrimitive
member.summary: Generate the implicit casting operators from primitives.

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.ImplicitCastToPrimitive
member.summary: Generate the implicit casting operators to primitives.

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.EqualsOperators
member.summary: Generate the equals operators.

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.FactoryMethods
member.summary: Generate the factory methods (From/TryFrom).

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.InstanceMethodsAndProperties
member.summary: Generate the instance methods, e.g. Value and IsInitialized

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.ValueObjectsDeriveFromTheInterface
member.summary: Value objects that are generated derive from `: IVogen`. Use just this flag if you have several projects and only wish to generate the definition in one of them, or if you want to define it yourself.

member.name: F:Vogen.StaticAbstractsGeneration.MostCommon
member.summary: The most common usage; generates the definition, containing equals, explicit casts, and factory methods, and make value objects derive from it.

member.name: T:Vogen.SystemTextJsonConverterFactoryGeneration
member.summary: Defines if a JSON converter 'factory' is generated containing value objects with System.Text.Json converters. These factories can be used in various scenarios with System.Text.Json, including source-generation.

member.name: F:Vogen.SystemTextJsonConverterFactoryGeneration.Omit
member.summary: Do not generate the factory.

member.name: F:Vogen.SystemTextJsonConverterFactoryGeneration.Generate
member.summary: Generate the factory.

member.name: P:Vogen.Validation.Data
member.summary: Contains data related to validation.

member.name: M:Vogen.Validation.WithData(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds the specified data to the validation. This data will be copied to the Data property of the thrown Exception.
member.param: The key.
The value.

member.summary: Configures aspects of this individual value object.
member.param: Specifies what conversion code is generated - defaults to which generates type converters and a converter to handle serialization using System.Text.Json
Specifies the type of exception thrown when validation fails—defaults to .
Simple customization switches—defaults to .
Specifies how strict deserialization is, e.g. should your Validate method be called, or should pre-defined instances that otherwise invalid be allowed - defaults to .

Specifies the level that debug attributes are written as some IDEs don't support all of them, e.g., Rider - defaults to which generates DebuggerDisplay and a debugger proxy type for IDEs that support them
Species which comparison code is generated—defaults to which hoists any IComparable implementations from the primitive.
Specifies which string comparison code is generated—defaults to which doesn't generate anything related to string comparison.

Controls how cast operators are generated for casting from the Value Object to the primitive. Options are implicit or explicit or none. Explicit is preferred over implicit if you really need them, but isn't recommended. See for more information.

Controls how cast operators are generated for casting from the primitive to the Value Object. Options are implicit or explicit or none. Explicit is preferred over implicit if you really need them, but isn't recommended. See for more information.
Specifies what is generated for IParsable types for strings - defaults to .
Specifies what is generated for Parse and TryParse methods - defaults to .
Specifies what to write for TryFrom methods—defaults to .
Specifies whether to generate an IsInitialized() method - defaults to .

member.name: T:Vogen.ValueObjectAttribute
member.summary: Marks a type as a Value Object. The type that this is applied to should be partial so that the source generator can augment it with equality, creation barriers, and any conversions.
Configures aspects of this individual value object.
member.param: The type of the primitive that is being wrapped—defaults to int.
Specifies what conversion code is generated - defaults to which generates type converters and a converter to handle serialization using System.Text.Json
Specifies the type of exception thrown when validation fails—defaults to .
Simple customization switches—defaults to .
Specifies how strict deserialization is, e.g. should your Validate method be called, or should pre-defined instances that otherwise invalid be allowed - defaults to .

Specifies the level that debug attributes are written as some IDEs don't support all of them, e.g., Rider - defaults to which generates DebuggerDisplay and a debugger proxy type for IDEs that support them
Species which comparison code is generated—defaults to which hoists any IComparable implementations from the primitive.
Specifies which string comparison code is generated—defaults to which doesn't generate anything related to string comparison.
Specifies the type of casting from wrapper to primitive - defaults to .
Specifies the type of casting from primitive to wrapper - default to .
Specifies what is generated for IParsable types for strings - defaults to .
Specifies what is generated for Parse and TryParse methods - defaults to .
Specifies what to write for TryFrom methods—defaults to .
Specifies whether to generate an IsInitialized() method - defaults to .

member.name: T:Vogen.ValueObjectOrError`1
member.summary: Represents a value object or an error. Returned by the generated TryFrom method, and allows instances to be checked without need to catch and inspect exceptions.

member.name: M:Vogen.ValueObjectOrError`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Creates a new instance representing a successful result containing the supplied value object.
member.param: The value object

member.name: M:Vogen.ValueObjectOrError`1.#ctor(Vogen.Validation)
member.summary: Creates a new instance representing a failure.
member.param: The object representing the error.

member.name: P:Vogen.ValueObjectOrError`1.IsSuccess
member.summary: Determines whether the operation represented by the current instance is successful.
member.value: true if the operation is successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Vogen.ValueObjectOrError`1.Error
member.summary: Returns the error, or if successful, a representing 'OK'.

member.name: P:Vogen.ValueObjectOrError`1.ValueObject
member.summary: Returns the wrapper, or throws an exception if the result failed.
member.exception: Throw when this type holds an error.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of a type that represents the default values used for value object generation.
member.param: The type of the primitive that is being wrapped—defaults to int.
Specifies what conversion code is generated - defaults to which generates type converters and a converter to handle serialization using System.Text.Json
Specifies the type of exception thrown when validation fails—defaults to .
Simple customization switches—defaults to .
Specifies how strict deserialization is, e.g. should your Validate method be called, or should pre-defined instances that otherwise invalid be allowed - defaults to .

Specifies the level that debug attributes are written as some IDEs don't support all of them, e.g., Rider - defaults to which generates DebuggerDisplay and a debugger proxy type for IDEs that support them

Controls how cast operators are generated for casting from the Value Object to the primitive. Options are implicit or explicit or none. Explicit is preferred over implicit if you really need them, but isn't recommended. See for more information.

Controls how cast operators are generated for casting from the primitive to the Value Object. Options are implicit or explicit or none. Explicit is preferred over implicit if you really need them, but isn't recommended. See <see href="https://github.com/SteveDunn/Vogen/wiki/Casting"/> for more information.
disables stack trace recording; in Debug builds, a stack trace is recorded and is thrown in the exception when something is created in an uninitialized state, e.g. after deserialization
Specifies what is generated for IParsable types for strings - defaults to .
Specifies what is generated for Parse and TryParse methods - defaults to .
Specifies what to write for TryFrom methods—defaults to .
Specifies whether to generate an IsInitialized() method - defaults to .
Controls the generation of the type factory for System.Text.Json.
Controls the generation of static abstract interfaces.
Controls the generation of a Swashbuckle schema filter for OpenAPI.
Every ValueObject attribute must explicitly specify the type of the primitive.
